description: ProductScope AI was Built for Brand Owners & Creative Agencies to help create beautiful product photos & optimized Amazon Listings in seconds.
title: AI Product Photography & Amazon Lising Optimizer for Brands
introduction: ProductScope AI equips e-commerce brands, marketers, and agencies with AI-powered tools to enhance their product design and marketing efforts. It streamlines the creation of engaging product visuals, offers deep customer insights, and crafts SEO-friendly content to boost brand visibility, conversions, and sales.
features: AI Photoshoot Tool: Create Instagram-worthy photos for any product in minutes.
Amazon Chrome Extension: Gain unique Amazon customer insights for any ASIN with a single click.
Amazon Listing Optimizer: Craft fully optimized Amazon listings in seconds.
Custom AI Backgrounds: Generate background scenes based on custom prompts.
Easy Drag-and-drop Editor: Easily edit your images with AI.
Images with multiple products: Upload multiple products or logos to your backgrounds.
Access to 31 Themes and 500+ Backdrops: Choose from a library of over 250 images spanning 21 different themes.
Magic Erase, Draw, Reimagine & more: Remove objects, defects, people, or text from your pictures in seconds.
Burst Mode: Generate 10-30 product photos with a single click.
Fast generations: Priority GPU access for quick image generation.
1 Click Resize & Upscaling: Generate photoshoots in multiple resolutions, upscale up to 2048x2048 resolution.
Photo Storage: Retain historical access to photoshoot results.
Chat Support: Real-time chat support from an AI-powered support bot.
targetPeople: E-commerce brands, designers, and marketing agencies.

faqs.question: How can I sign up for a free trial?
faqs.answer: You can sign up risk-free and without a credit card. A free account offers 200 free image credits with the Photoshoot tool and 1 listing optimization with the Amazon listing optimizer.

faqs.question: How much does ProductScope AI cost?
faqs.answer: AI Photoshoot plans: $19/month for 1,000 image credits or $39/month for unlimited images. Amazon Listing Optimizer plans: $34/month for 10 listings or $99/month for 50 listings. Annual plans offer up to 30% savings.

faqs.question: Who owns the images I create?
faqs.answer: You own the images and are free to use them as you wish.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can sign up for a free account which includes 200 free image credits and 1 free listing optimization.

faqs.question: What are the free Amazon Insights?
faqs.answer: The Amazon Insights Chrome Extension analyzes Amazon reviews to provide insights about customer demographics, intent, sentiment, and motivation.

faqs.question: How does ProductScope AI ensure data security?
faqs.answer: ProductScope AI ensures that data is not stored with a third-party AI technology provider. Anonymized data is shared with a third-party LLM partner only when using the feature, with a zero-retention/zero-training policy.

faqs.question: Do you offer any advertising support?
faqs.answer: Yes, through FosterFBA, a leading Amazon Advertising Agency. FosterFBA Ad clients get access to Pro plans for both tools in ProductScope AI.
